utterance: Crack three eggs on a bowl and whisk with a pinch of salt.
Heat butter or oil on a pan on high heat.
Add the egg mixture to the pan and stir the eggs.
When the eggs are set but look slightly wet, turn off the heat and fold the omelette.
After a few seconds, transfer the omelette onto a plate.
Put your vegetables in a bowl.
Add salt, pepper and olive oil.
Mix the eggs with your whisk in a circular fast wrist motion.
Mix all of your vegetables in the bowls so they'll be coated evenly with the seasonings.
